name: Pacomix
overview: A freeware puzzle game where you must collect all the items in an area, however once you head in a direction, you will keep going until you hit a wall or a reflector item. Now you must discover how to get all items with these limitations and then get to the exit to the next level. This game had a sequel. A logic game released as freeware and created mainly by one person - Zelený - under the banner of the Crazy Boys group. The game Pacomix is a combination of two well-known games. Atomix puzzle games (where you move atoms and try to assemble a molecule.
